ygData.subject: Re: Hrmm
ygData.msgSnippet: The lake in Halas is tiny.  I covered every inch of it while raising swimming skill after leveling last night.  There s absolutely nothing there. Calbasil
ygData.messageBody:
The lake in Halas is tiny. I covered every inch of it while raising swimming skill
after leveling last night. There's absolutely nothing there.

Calbasil Psyrex of Ak'Anon (Bertoxx)
House of Silmindo


Eron Linver wrote:

> From: Eron Linver <aeron@...>
>
> Barbarians get caught in our town, so if a barbarian shaman found the clue it is
> very unlikely in akanon. Because my friend is a shaman and due to game bugs has
> had to gate out of akanon almost every time he entered it.
>
> Nick Bock wrote:
>
> > From: "Nick Bock" <nickbock@...>
> >
> > Hey guys,
> >
> > If the clue was to look below waves, and before it was stated that a
> > Barbarian Shaman would do the exploring, what about the lake outside of
> > Halas? Has that already been brought up? If need be, I can take my
> > Magician up there and poke around?
> >
>
> --Eron
> aeron@...
> -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
>
> from The Simpsons:
>
> Homer: Animals are crapping in our houses, and we're picking it up. Did we lose
> a war?? That's not America. That's not even Mexico.
>
>
